ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: It is AC 2 Cha +5 but the last time I went looking for Drosco, he no longer spawns where he once did. He is not an unnnamed zombie that spawns somewhere else
ygData.messageBody:
It is AC 2 Cha +5 but the last time I went looking for Drosco, he no
longer spawns where he once did. He is not an unnnamed zombie that spawns
somewhere else entire :(

My enchanter still wears hers. But... I have no clue where to get it now :(

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
>Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 1:22 PM

>There is a magic necklace that is a good item for low to mid level bards
>that is fairly easy to acquire solo. Its called the Order of Thunder (no
>drop) and is found off a named zombie in the Qeynos aqueducts. Its been a
>while since I wore it (got a Cape of the Midnight Mist now) but IIRC one of
>the bonuses is +5 charisma. It also has a small AC boost as well as
>function as a light source. Check out a spoiler site if you want to know
>all the stats on it.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
